data.name: Eye For Blood
data.detailed_description:
Eye For Blood is a dark and gritty detective game set in 1978, it's focus lies in letting the player solve everything themselves, using only their wits.

You arrive at a crime scene with the tools needed to solve the case and the rest is up to you!

The game features:
- A captivating story about African American detective Kordell Hines in 1978. Using nothing but your wits you'll start by solving the cases assigned to you, but you'll quickly realize something isn't right and certain cases are being hidden from you...

- 8 separate cases, although they are all connected by one storyline.

- All characters are fully voice acted and you can interrogate them on any piece of evidence you find!

- 3 different difficulty levels, for the more casual detectives and the detectives who don't want any help from the game

- Full controller support


Note: The game is still relatively early in development but you can wishlist to be notified when the game gets released.
